fr:mainmatter.fr:p: We discussed the current strategy I've been developing for unfolding cyclic proofs until they are inert for a particular proof variable, focussing on the case of unfolding a non-inert cycle that is nested inside an inert cycle.
This case is problematic because, using our existing notion of copying external cycles when unfolding, new external cycles which are no longer inert can be created in this process.
